data.name: Secret of the Shrine Maiden Demo
data.detailed_description:
A new visual novel H-game from XTER COMIC and Palo Publishing.

Adapted from a Thai Best-selling Ero-Light Novel ‘Secret of the Forest Shrine Maiden.’

Character design and illustration by XTER Comic.

= Everyone has their own secrets =
Under the beautiful image, lies the hidden cover.
Darkness, lust, desire, death
Would you dare to pay the high cost to reveal?

In the hidden valley among the faraway forest in Japan, lies the small village – Kanzakiyama –
The ancient land believed as the land connected to the underworld.
The women in this village are bestowed with the blessing of the death goddess, an eternal youth and beauty.
Especially, the shrine maiden of Kanzakiyama – the goddess avatar – who descended to the earth.
She is the stepmother of a foreign guy from faraway country.
A stranger who lives with his stepsister and childhood friend, knowing nothing.
Until the full moon day when the village open to the outsider
A guy uncovers a hidden secret.

The secret that rolls him into the endless mysteries, dangers, and death.
Passion, lust, desire, affection, darkness, evil, and malevolent creeping on.
What lies beneath this village?

Who can be trusted?
What is the truth, what is the deception?
A secret shall be revealed on your hand.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible with OpenGL
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: This game has mature contents including nudity.
